Package me.schlaubi.kaesk.api

Interface ArgumentDeserializer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of argument
public interface ArgumentDeserializer<T>
Deserializer for command arguments.

  • Method Summary

    Converts the input the the given type.

    Deserializes a vararg.

    Checkst whether the input is of type T or not.

    Provides possibilities for tab complete

    Returns whether this deserializer supports var-args.

    • varargIsValid

      boolean varargIsValid​(java.lang.String[] args, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Checks if var-arg is valid.
      Parameters:
      args - the string input
      clazz - the Class of the parameter type
      Returns:
      the deserialized vararg
      Implementation Note:
      this is only being called when supportsVararg() returned true

    • deserializeVararg

      @NotNull @NotNull T[] deserializeVararg​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String[] args, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Deserializes a vararg.
      Parameters:
      args - the string input
      clazz - the Class of the parameter type
      Returns:
      the deserialized vararg
      Implementation Note:
      this is only being called when supportsVararg() and varargIsValid(String[], Class) returned true

    • providePossibilities

      @NotNull default @NotNull java.util.List<java.lang.String> providePossibilities​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String parameterName, boolean isVarArg, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Provides possibilities for tab complete
      Parameters:
      parameterName - the name of the parameter to provide possibilities for
      isVarArg - whether the parameter is a vararg or not
      clazz - the Class of the parameter
      Returns:
      a list of possible arguments
